attributes.action: Bring back the Death Penalty for murder
attributes.additional_details: The death Penalty is a sure and positive approach to helping stop individuals from murdering other human beings
attributes.background: The government should Bring back the penalty of death by execution for murder

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 


https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
